item.title: Hong Kong-listed 4Paradigm Releases Stablecoin Underlying Asset Management SolutionHong Kong-listed company 4Paradigm has released a stablecoin underlying asset management solution that supports stablecoin issuers in dynamically managing USD/CNY/HKD-pegged asset pools (such as short-term treasury bonds, cash, repos, etc.). (Zhitong Finance) [Odaily]

item.title: swarms: Community Discord Account Hacked, Team Actively RecoveringAI agent protocol swarms announced on the X platform that its community Discord account was hacked. The attackers deleted multiple channels and removed more than 300 community members. The team is currently working hard to restore the community and is taking additional security measures to prevent such incidents from happening again. [Odaily]

item.title: BitMart Officially Launches New Staking Loan FeatureAccording to official news, BitMart has officially launched a new staking loan feature, allowing users to obtain instant loan amounts by staking their existing assets, thereby increasing capital liquidity without the need for realization. In addition, BitMart has simultaneously launched a limited-time event: new users can enjoy a 50% subsidy on loan interest, and some users can even get up to 100% full repayment, achieving a "zero interest rate" loan experience; in addition, there is also a chance to get up to 1,000.00 USDC reward. [Odaily]

item.title: OKX DEX API Now Supports MEV Protection and Transaction SimulationOKX DEX API now features MEV protection and transaction simulation, fully supporting numerous public chains such as ETH, SOL, and BSC. The MEV protection feature proactively prevents sandwich attacks, helping users avoid asset losses caused by MEV. The transaction simulation API allows users to predict transaction results by simulating the transaction execution process before the actual execution, reducing user risk, optimizing transaction costs, and avoiding losses caused by on-chain operation failures. [Odaily]

item.title: Bitget will distribute BTC or ETH interest rate coupons to users participating in the ERA LaunchpoolBitget has launched a follow-up ERA Launchpool event. Users who participate in the BTC or ETH pool of ERA Launchpool between 18:00 on July 18 and 18:00 on July 20 (UTC+8), and whose net BTC or ETH deposit is positive during the period, will be eligible to receive a 10% BTC and ETH wealth management interest rate hike coupon. The interest rate hike coupon will be automatically distributed to the user's account within 1 business day after the end of the Launchpool. After obtaining it, it must be activated and used within 7 days, otherwise it will automatically expire. [Odaily]

item.title: Hotcoin Exchange is about to launch TA, ZKWASM, and AICE spot trading pairs and the TA contract trading pair.On July 21, according to official news, the Hotcoin exchange will launch the following trading pairs at the following times: Spot trading pair TA/USDT (July 21, 17:20 UTC+8): $TA is the native token of the Trust AI project, dedicated to improving the efficiency and transparency of financial services through artificial intelligence technology. ZKWASM/USDT (July 22, 20:20 UTC+8): $ZKWASM is the native token of the ZKWASM Hub project, which aims to provide strong support for decentralized applications and promote the development of blockchain technology. AICE/USDT (July 23, 18:00 UTC+8): $AICE is the native token of the AICEAN project, focusing on the combination of artificial intelligence and blockchain to provide innovative solutions and services. Contract trading pair TA/USDT (July 21, 17:00 UTC+8): $TA is the contract trading of the Trust AI project, supporting up to 50x leverage trading, providing investors with flexible trading strategy choices, and helping users obtain profits in market fluctuations. [Techflow]

item.title: Minsheng Securities: Stablecoins are expected to help traditional financial assets conduct "on-chain" transactions.According to Sina Finance, Minsheng Securities stated that, in the short term, cross-border payment scenarios are expected to become an important application scenario for stablecoin adoption. Stablecoins are expected to help improve the efficiency of cross-border payments and reduce cross-border payment costs. Fintech companies related to cross-border payments are expected to continue to benefit, and LianLian DigiTech is recommended for close attention. In the long term, stablecoins are expected to promote virtual asset trading and RWA, STO. Stablecoins are expected to help traditional financial assets conduct "on-chain" transactions. Chinese securities firms are accelerating their layout, such as Guotai Junan International upgrading its virtual asset trading license, and GF Securities has fully connected to HashKey Chain as its core on-chain issuance network and issued its first daily redeemable tokenized security, GF Token. Leading securities firms and exchange targets are expected to benefit more from stablecoin development. [Foresight News]

item.title: Ethereum spot ETFs saw net inflows of $2.18B last week, a new all-time high for weekly net inflows.SoSoValue data shows that Ethereum spot ETFs saw a net inflow of $2.18B during last week's trading days (Eastern Time, July 14 to July 18). The Ethereum spot ETF with the largest net inflow last week was Blackrock's ETF ETHA, with a weekly net inflow of $1.76B, and the total historical net inflow of ETHA currently reaches $8.06B. The second largest was Grayscale's Ethereum Mini Trust ETF ETH, with a weekly net inflow of $202.00M, and the total historical net inflow of ETH currently reaches $1.03B. It is worth noting that all nine Ethereum ETFs saw net inflows last week, among which the weekly net inflows of ETHA and ETH both hit record highs. As of press time, the total net asset value of Ethereum spot ETFs is $18.37B, the ETF net asset ratio (market value as a percentage of the total market value of Ethereum) reaches 4.19%, and the cumulative historical net inflow has reached $7.49B. [Odaily News]

item.title: Analyst: Current bull market cycle led by institutions, whether it will benefit altcoins remains uncertainPresto Research analyst Min Jung said that supported by sustained institutional demand (especially from cryptocurrency fund management companies), Bitcoin continues to hover near its all-time high, and the price of ETH has also benefited from the push of institutional investors. More and more listed companies are starting to include ETH in their corporate treasuries, and the market is showing early signs of an altcoin season, but it is uncertain whether this strong momentum will extend to the broader altcoin market. (The Block) [Odaily News]
